THE WEEKLY BRIEF AN UNDERWEAR BLOG

7 Reasons why guys are switching to Mack Weldon

BY BEN MADISON - 11.13.2017

Everywhere you look there’s a company claiming that they have life changing underwear. You’ve worn the same brand of underwear your entire life – why change it now? We dug deeper into one of them to find out why so many guys are upgrading to Mack Weldon.

TRY IT TODAY

1. Their fabric was engineered for comfort.

Seriously. It’s a proprietary blend of long staple cotton, beechwood modal, and Lycra® that sits for 18 hours before being cut. 18 hours is exactly how long it takes for the material to naturally expand so you get a softer feel and more consistent fit. This unique process is one of the main reasons you won’t find underwear like theirs anywhere else.

TRY IT TODAY

2. Their design is smarter.

Mack Weldon’s innovative design has finally solved the problems we’ve been dealing with for years. The legs stay-put and never feel constricting. Their super-soft, microfiber waistband holds its shape and won’t roll over. You’ll notice the difference right away.

TRY IT TODAY

3. They have a Try-On Guarantee.

Underwear is personal, so the only way to get the right fit is to try it on. If you don’t love your first pair, their Try-On Guarantee promises a full refund with no return required (yes, you can even keep the pair you tried on). These guys put their money where their mouth is.

TRY IT TODAY

Mack Weldon is reinventing men’s basics. We believe in smart design, premium fabrics, and simple shopping.

SHOP NOW

4. The experts are impressed.

We don’t usually promote name dropping, but when it comes to CNBC, WSJ, GQ, and the NY Times – we’ll make an exception. The Huffington Post dubbed Mack Weldon "The Apple of Underwear" and Men's Health magazine ranks them as the "Best Underwear for Men". It’s one thing to make the news, but it’s another thing to make the news for underwear.

TRY IT TODAY

5. Mesh Cool Zones.

Let’s face it, everybody likes to keep it cool. This underwear is constructed with mesh cool zones located where you need them the most – near the fly and lower back. Their advanced fabric made from pique mesh enhances airflow and maximizes breathability to keep you cooler.

TRY IT TODAY

6. The numbers don’t lie.

With over 1.5 million shipped and less than 2% returned – they did something right. You can see and feel the 10,000 hours they spent designing their underwear in every stitch and seam. The difference is literally in the details.

TRY IT TODAY

7. You’re reading about underwear.

If you made it to #7, you need new underwear. You might be fine with what you’re wearing, but you could be more comfortable in Mack Weldon. Still think “it’s just underwear” … see number #3.

TRY IT TODAY

Get Comfortable.
